abstract: Sales for each of the nation’s four largest automakers fell last month, prompting some executives to forecast a gloomy spring, a period that typically posts strong sales.
snippet: Sales for each of the nation’s four largest automakers fell last month, prompting some executives to forecast a gloomy spring, a period that typically posts strong sales.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT  Sales for each of the nation’s four largest automakers fell last month, prompting some executives to forecast a gloomy spring, a period that typically posts strong sales.

headline.main: Auto Sales Are Down Again, but G.M. and Toyota Are Optimistic
headline.print_headline: Auto Sales Are Down Again, but G.M. and Toyota Are Optimistic
